data.description: Create your own quizzes and tests
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module will allow users to create their own tests, by reading
    in a file that contains both questions and the answers. You can
    specify how many questions you want in your test, and the questions
    will appear in random order when running the test.

    I felt that an object-oriented approach was the easiest to
    implement, scales well, and will allow for easier modification of
    the source code.
